name: Dice Monsters
description:
Summon monsters to defend your crystals from  the oncoming monsters.

How to play

ESC:  Opens the options menu where you can change the screen size.

Goal: Destroy the enemy  crystals before they can destroy yours.

At the start of your turn your dice pool fills with you resource dice for the turn.

Yellow - Energy                       Blue -  Defense

Red - Attack                               Green - Movement

After summoning a monster click on it , on the gameboard, to move it.
